H0.text: when was the term prime minister first used. 1690

H1.text: when was the term prime minister first used. 1715

H2.text: when was the term prime minister first used. 1740

H3.text: when was the term prime minister first used. 1624

A4.text: The term 'prime minister' is attested in 17th century sources referring to Cardinal Richelieu, after he was named premier ministre to head the French royal council in 1624.
